article_ref: Art. 14 Abs. 1 i. V. m. Art. 6aâ€“7a und 8 NSAG
law_text: Use of a national road of first or second class without the vignette required for the validity period
notes: Driving on national roads without the required toll vignette.

article_ref: Art. 14 Abs. 1 i. V. m. Art. 6a, 7 und 8 NSAG
law_text: Use of a national road of first or second class with a required adhesive vignette for the validity period that is not affixed, or not affixed at the prescribed location directly on the vehicle, or is damaged
notes: Driving with a vignette that is incorrectly affixed (not directly to the vehicle) or damaged.
